class.name: PLATEAUDatasetSource
class.brief_description: Access to PLATEAU dataset (local or server).

method.name: create_local
method.description: Create a dataset source from a local directory path.

method.name: get_default_server_url
method.description: Returns the default PLATEAU API server URL.

method.name: get_mock_server_url
method.description: Returns the mock server URL for testing (no authentication required).

method.name: build_auth_headers
method.description: Build authentication headers for PLATEAU API requests. [param token]: Bearer token for authentication (empty for no auth). Returns array with Content-Type and optionally Authorization headers. For production API access, obtain a token from PLATEAU website. [codeblock] # For mock server (no auth needed) var headers = PLATEAUDatasetSource.build_auth_headers("") # With user token for production server var headers = PLATEAUDatasetSource.build_auth_headers("my-token") [/codeblock]

method.name: is_valid
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the source is valid and accessible.

method.name: get_available_packages
method.description: Returns a bitmask of available packages (see [enum PLATEAUCityModelPackage]).

method.name: get_gml_files
method.description: Get GML files for the specified package type(s). Use [enum PLATEAUCityModelPackage] flags.

method.name: get_mesh_codes
method.description: Get mesh codes (region IDs) available in this dataset.

method.name: filter_by_mesh_codes
method.description: Create a filtered source containing only the specified mesh codes.
